item.title: JWT 实战指南：Go 语言身份认证最佳实践
item.description:
前言

JWT（JSON Web Token）是一种开放标准（RFC 7519），用于在各方之间安全地传输信息作为 JSON 对象。JWT 常用于身份认证和信息交换，是现代 Web 应用中最流行的认证方案之一。

一、JWT 基础

1.1 JWT 结构

JWT 由三部分组成，使用 . 分隔：

1

Header.Payload.Signature

1
2
3

eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.
eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkFsaWNlIiwiaWF0IjoxNTE2MjM5MDIyfQ.
SflKxwRJSMeKKF2QT4fwpMeJf36POk6yJV_adQssw5c

Header（头部）：

1
2
3
4

{
  "alg": "HS256",
  "typ": "JWT"
}

Payload（载荷）：

1
2
3
4
5
6

{
  "sub": "1234567890",
  "name": "Alice",
  "iat": 1516239022,
  "exp": 1516242622
}

Signature（签名）：

1
2
3
4

HMACSHA256(
  base64UrlEncode(header) + "." + base64UrlEncode(payload),
  secret
)

1.2 标准声明

声明 说明
iss 签发者
sub 主题（通常是用户ID）
aud 接收方
exp 过期时间
nbf 生效时间
iat 签发时间
jti JWT ID，唯一标识

package auth

import (
    "github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5"
    "time"
)

// 自定义 Claims
type CustomClaims struct {
    UserID   int64  `json:"user_id"`
    Username string `json:"username"`
    Role     string `json:"role"`
    jwt.RegisteredClaims
}

// JWT 配置
type JWTConfig struct {
    SecretKey     string
    AccessExpire  time.Duration
    RefreshExpire time.Duration
    Issuer        string
}

var config = JWTConfig{
    SecretKey:     "your-secret-key-at-least-32-characters",
    AccessExpire:  2 * time.Hour,
    RefreshExpire: 7 * 24 * time.Hour,
    Issuer:        "my-app",
}

// 生成 Access Token
func GenerateAccessToken(userID int64, username, role string) (string, error) {
    claims := CustomClaims{
        UserID:   userID,
        Username: username,
        Role:     role,
        RegisteredClaims: jwt.RegisteredClaims{
            ExpiresAt: jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now().Add(config.AccessExpire)),
            IssuedAt:  jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now()),
            NotBefore: jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now()),
            Issuer:    config.Issuer,
            Subject:   fmt.Sprintf("%d", userID),
        },
    }
    
    token := jwt.NewWithClaims(jwt.SigningMethodHS256, claims)
    return token.SignedString([]byte(config.SecretKey))
}

// 生成 Refresh Token
func GenerateRefreshToken(userID int64) (string, error) {
    claims := jwt.RegisteredClaims{
        ExpiresAt: jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now().Add(config.RefreshExpire)),
        IssuedAt:  jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now()),
        Issuer:    config.Issuer,
        Subject:   fmt.Sprintf("%d", userID),
    }
    
    token := jwt.NewWithClaims(jwt.SigningMethodHS256, claims)
    return token.SignedString([]byte(config.SecretKey))
}

// 生成 Token 对
func GenerateTokenPair(userID int64, username, role string) (accessToken, refreshToken string, err error) {
    accessToken, err = GenerateAccessToken(userID, username, role)
    if err != nil {
        return "", "", err
    }
    
    refreshToken, err = GenerateRefreshToken(userID)
    if err != nil {
        return "", "", err
    }
    
    return accessToken, refreshToken, nil
}

// 解析并验证 Token
func ParseToken(tokenString string) (*CustomClaims, error) {
    token, err := jwt.ParseWithClaims(tokenString, &CustomClaims{}, func(token *jwt.Token) (interface{}, error) {
        // 验证签名算法
        if _, ok := token.Method.(*jwt.SigningMethodHMAC); !ok {
            return nil, fmt.Errorf("unexpected signing method: %v", token.Header["alg"])
        }
        return []byte(config.SecretKey), nil
    })
    
    if err != nil {
        return nil, err
    }
    
    if claims, ok := token.Claims.(*CustomClaims); ok && token.Valid {
        return claims, nil
    }
    
    return nil, errors.New("invalid token")
}

// 验证 Refresh Token
func ParseRefreshToken(tokenString string) (*jwt.RegisteredClaims, error) {
    token, err := jwt.ParseWithClaims(tokenString, &jwt.RegisteredClaims{}, func(token *jwt.Token) (interface{}, error) {
        if _, ok := token.Method.(*jwt.SigningMethodHMAC); !ok {
            return nil, fmt.Errorf("unexpected signing method: %v", token.Header["alg"])
        }
        return []byte(config.SecretKey), nil
    })
    
    if err != nil {
        return nil, err
    }
    
    if claims, ok := token.Claims.(*jwt.RegisteredClaims); ok && token.Valid {
        return claims, nil
    }
    
    return nil, errors.New("invalid refresh token")
}

package middleware

import (
    "strings"
    "github.com/gin-gonic/gin"
)

func JWTAuth() gin.HandlerFunc {
    return func(c *gin.Context) {
        // 获取 Authorization Header
        authHeader := c.GetHeader("Authorization")
        if authHeader == "" {
            c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "authorization header required"})
            c.Abort()
            return
        }
        
        // 检查 Bearer 前缀
        parts := strings.SplitN(authHeader, " ", 2)
        if len(parts) != 2 || parts[0] != "Bearer" {
            c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "invalid authorization header format"})
            c.Abort()
            return
        }
        
        // 解析 Token
        claims, err := auth.ParseToken(parts[1])
        if err != nil {
            c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "invalid or expired token"})
            c.Abort()
            return
        }
        
        // 将用户信息存入上下文
        c.Set("userID", claims.UserID)
        c.Set("username", claims.Username)
        c.Set("role", claims.Role)
        c.Set("claims", claims)
        
        c.Next()
    }
}

// 角色验证中间件
func RequireRole(roles ...string) gin.HandlerFunc {
    return func(c *gin.Context) {
        role, exists := c.Get("role")
        if !exists {
            c.JSON(403, gin.H{"error": "role not found"})
            c.Abort()
            return
        }
        
        userRole := role.(string)
        for _, r := range roles {
            if userRole == r {
                c.Next()
                return
            }
        }
        
        c.JSON(403, gin.H{"error": "insufficient permissions"})
        c.Abort()
    }
}

func SetupRouter() *gin.Engine {
    r := gin.Default()
    
    // 公开路由
    public := r.Group("/api/v1")
    {
        public.POST("/login", LoginHandler)
        public.POST("/register", RegisterHandler)
        public.POST("/refresh", RefreshTokenHandler)
    }
    
    // 需要认证的路由
    protected := r.Group("/api/v1")
    protected.Use(middleware.JWTAuth())
    {
        protected.GET("/profile", GetProfileHandler)
        protected.PUT("/profile", UpdateProfileHandler)
    }
    
    // 管理员路由
    admin := r.Group("/api/v1/admin")
    admin.Use(middleware.JWTAuth(), middleware.RequireRole("admin"))
    {
        admin.GET("/users", ListUsersHandler)
        admin.DELETE("/users/:id", DeleteUserHandler)
    }
    
    return r
}

type LoginRequest struct {
    Username string `json:"username" binding:"required"`
    Password string `json:"password" binding:"required"`
}

type LoginResponse struct {
    AccessToken  string `json:"access_token"`
    RefreshToken string `json:"refresh_token"`
    ExpiresIn    int64  `json:"expires_in"`
    TokenType    string `json:"token_type"`
}

func LoginHandler(c *gin.Context) {
    var req LoginRequest
    if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
        c.JSON(400, gin.H{"error": err.Error()})
        return
    }
    
    // 验证用户
    user, err := userService.ValidateUser(req.Username, req.Password)
    if err != nil {
        c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "invalid credentials"})
        return
    }
    
    // 生成 Token
    accessToken, refreshToken, err := auth.GenerateTokenPair(user.ID, user.Username, user.Role)
    if err != nil {
        c.JSON(500, gin.H{"error": "failed to generate token"})
        return
    }
    
    // 将 Refresh Token 存入 Redis（可选，用于注销）
    rdb.Set(c, fmt.Sprintf("refresh_token:%d", user.ID), refreshToken, 7*24*time.Hour)
    
    c.JSON(200, LoginResponse{
        AccessToken:  accessToken,
        RefreshToken: refreshToken,
        ExpiresIn:    int64(config.AccessExpire.Seconds()),
        TokenType:    "Bearer",
    })
}

type RefreshRequest struct {
    RefreshToken string `json:"refresh_token" binding:"required"`
}

func RefreshTokenHandler(c *gin.Context) {
    var req RefreshRequest
    if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
        c.JSON(400, gin.H{"error": err.Error()})
        return
    }
    
    // 解析 Refresh Token
    claims, err := auth.ParseRefreshToken(req.RefreshToken)
    if err != nil {
        c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "invalid refresh token"})
        return
    }
    
    userID, _ := strconv.ParseInt(claims.Subject, 10, 64)
    
    // 验证 Refresh Token 是否在 Redis 中（可选）
    storedToken, err := rdb.Get(c, fmt.Sprintf("refresh_token:%d", userID)).Result()
    if err != nil || storedToken != req.RefreshToken {
        c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "refresh token revoked"})
        return
    }
    
    // 获取用户信息
    user, err := userService.GetByID(userID)
    if err != nil {
        c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "user not found"})
        return
    }
    
    // 生成新的 Token 对
    accessToken, refreshToken, err := auth.GenerateTokenPair(user.ID, user.Username, user.Role)
    if err != nil {
        c.JSON(500, gin.H{"error": "failed to generate token"})
        return
    }
    
    // 更新 Redis 中的 Refresh Token
    rdb.Set(c, fmt.Sprintf("refresh_token:%d", user.ID), refreshToken, 7*24*time.Hour)
    
    c.JSON(200, LoginResponse{
        AccessToken:  accessToken,
        RefreshToken: refreshToken,
        ExpiresIn:    int64(config.AccessExpire.Seconds()),
        TokenType:    "Bearer",
    })
}

func LogoutHandler(c *gin.Context) {
    userID, _ := c.Get("userID")
    
    // 删除 Redis 中的 Refresh Token
    rdb.Del(c, fmt.Sprintf("refresh_token:%d", userID))
    
    // 可选：将当前 Access Token 加入黑名单
    token := c.GetHeader("Authorization")
    if parts := strings.SplitN(token, " ", 2); len(parts) == 2 {
        claims, _ := auth.ParseToken(parts[1])
        if claims != nil {
            // 计算 Token 剩余有效期
            remaining := time.Until(claims.ExpiresAt.Time)
            if remaining > 0 {
                rdb.Set(c, fmt.Sprintf("token_blacklist:%s", parts[1]), "1", remaining)
            }
        }
    }
    
    c.JSON(200, gin.H{"message": "logged out successfully"})
}

// 在 JWTAuth 中间件中添加黑名单检查
func JWTAuth() gin.HandlerFunc {
    return func(c *gin.Context) {
        // ... 获取 token ...
        
        // 检查黑名单
        if _, err := rdb.Get(c, fmt.Sprintf("token_blacklist:%s", parts[1])).Result(); err == nil {
            c.JSON(401, gin.H{"error": "token has been revoked"})
            c.Abort()
            return
        }
        
        // ... 继续验证 ...
    }
}

// 使用环境变量管理密钥
func LoadConfig() *JWTConfig {
    secretKey := os.Getenv("JWT_SECRET_KEY")
    if secretKey == "" {
        log.Fatal("JWT_SECRET_KEY environment variable is required")
    }
    
    return &JWTConfig{
        SecretKey:     secretKey,
        AccessExpire:  parseDuration(os.Getenv("JWT_ACCESS_EXPIRE"), 2*time.Hour),
        RefreshExpire: parseDuration(os.Getenv("JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRE"), 7*24*time.Hour),
        Issuer:        os.Getenv("JWT_ISSUER"),
    }
}

// 使用 RS256 非对称加密（更安全）
func GenerateTokenWithRS256(claims jwt.Claims) (string, error) {
    privateKey, err := jwt.ParseRSAPrivateKeyFromPEM(privateKeyPEM)
    if err != nil {
        return "", err
    }
    
    token := jwt.NewWithClaims(jwt.SigningMethodRS256, claims)
    return token.SignedString(privateKey)
}

func ParseTokenWithRS256(tokenString string) (*CustomClaims, error) {
    publicKey, err := jwt.ParseRSAPublicKeyFromPEM(publicKeyPEM)
    if err != nil {
        return nil, err
    }
    
    token, err := jwt.ParseWithClaims(tokenString, &CustomClaims{}, func(token *jwt.Token) (interface{}, error) {
        if _, ok := token.Method.(*jwt.SigningMethodRSA); !ok {
            return nil, fmt.Errorf("unexpected signing method: %v", token.Header["alg"])
        }
        return publicKey, nil
    })
    
    if err != nil {
        return nil, err
    }
    
    if claims, ok := token.Claims.(*CustomClaims); ok && token.Valid {
        return claims, nil
    }
    
    return nil, errors.New("invalid token")
}

// 前端安全存储建议

// 1. Access Token 存储在内存中
let accessToken = null;

// 2. Refresh Token 存储在 HttpOnly Cookie 中
// 后端设置：
// c.SetCookie("refresh_token", refreshToken, 7*24*3600, "/", "", true, true)

// 3. 使用 axios 拦截器自动添加 Token
axios.interceptors.request.use(config => {
    if (accessToken) {
        config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${accessToken}`;
    }
    return config;
});

// 4. 自动刷新 Token
axios.interceptors.response.use(
    response => response,
    async error => {
        if (error.response.status === 401) {
            try {
                const { data } = await axios.post('/api/v1/refresh');
                accessToken = data.access_token;
                error.config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${accessToken}`;
                return axios(error.config);
            } catch (e) {
                // 刷新失败，跳转登录页
                window.location.href = '/login';
            }
        }
        return Promise.reject(error);
    }
);

// internal/auth/jwt.go
package auth

import (
    "errors"
    "fmt"
    "os"
    "time"
    
    "github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5"
)

type CustomClaims struct {
    UserID   int64  `json:"user_id"`
    Username string `json:"username"`
    Role     string `json:"role"`
    jwt.RegisteredClaims
}

var (
    secretKey     = os.Getenv("JWT_SECRET_KEY")
    accessExpire  = 2 * time.Hour
    refreshExpire = 7 * 24 * time.Hour
)

func GenerateTokenPair(userID int64, username, role string) (string, string, error) {
    // Access Token
    accessClaims := CustomClaims{
        UserID:   userID,
        Username: username,
        Role:     role,
        RegisteredClaims: jwt.RegisteredClaims{
            ExpiresAt: jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now().Add(accessExpire)),
            IssuedAt:  jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now()),
            Issuer:    "my-app",
            Subject:   fmt.Sprintf("%d", userID),
        },
    }
    
    accessToken := jwt.NewWithClaims(jwt.SigningMethodHS256, accessClaims)
    accessTokenString, err := accessToken.SignedString([]byte(secretKey))
    if err != nil {
        return "", "", err
    }
    
    // Refresh Token
    refreshClaims := jwt.RegisteredClaims{
        ExpiresAt: jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now().Add(refreshExpire)),
        IssuedAt:  jwt.NewNumericDate(time.Now()),
        Issuer:    "my-app",
        Subject:   fmt.Sprintf("%d", userID),
    }
    
    refreshToken := jwt.NewWithClaims(jwt.SigningMethodHS256, refreshClaims)
    refreshTokenString, err := refreshToken.SignedString([]byte(secretKey))
    if err != nil {
        return "", "", err
    }
    
    return accessTokenString, refreshTokenString, nil
}

func ParseToken(tokenString string) (*CustomClaims, error) {
    token, err := jwt.ParseWithClaims(tokenString, &CustomClaims{}, func(token *jwt.Token) (interface{}, error) {
        return []byte(secretKey), nil
    })
    
    if err != nil {
        return nil, err
    }
    
    if claims, ok := token.Claims.(*CustomClaims); ok && token.Valid {
        return claims, nil
    }
    
    return nil, errors.New("invalid token")
}

总结

JWT 是现代 Web 应用中最流行的身份认证方案，具有无状态、可扩展的优点。

核心要点：

  • 🔐 理解 JWT 结构和原理
  • ⏰ 合理设置 Token 有效期
  • 🔄 实现 Token 刷新机制
  • 🛡️ 注重安全最佳实践
  • 🚀 结合 Redis 实现 Token 管理
